```{r Load Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

---

Display colours in a palette

```{r Display Colours, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
display.brewer.all(colorblindFriendly = TRUE)
```

---

Set Colour Palette 

```{r Scale Color Brewer, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(displ, hwy, colour = drv)) +
  geom_jitter(size = 5, alpha = 0.3) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set2") + # or you could set colour = "steelblue" within geom_jitter to control colour
  theme_minimal()
```

---

Control Colours Manually  

```{r Scale Color Manual, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(displ, hwy, colour = drv)) +
  geom_jitter(size = 5, alpha = 0.3) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c(
    "4" = "green",
    "f" = "red",
    "r" = "blue")) +
  theme_minimal()
```
